game.name: Soul Axiom Rebooted
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The new enhanced edition of Soul Axiom - a first-person story-driven adventure puzzle game, set in the beautiful, haunting cyber-world of Elysia. Collect unique hand powers, discover multiple endings and choose your own destiny as you unravel the mystery of your digital afterlife.
